Title: Expert, Customer Experience Management (Life Insurance Project)
Company: Techcombank
Location: HO, Số 6 Phố Quang Trung, Phường Trần Hưng Đạo, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Thành phố Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Số 6 Quang Trung, phường Trần Hưng Đạo, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Thành Phố Hà Nội
Job Description:
Job Purpose:
As an Expert in Customer Experience Management, you will play a pivotal role in shaping and ensuring the consistent application of customer experience (CX) design, operation, and measurement principles across all customer touchpoints. You will work cross-functionally to embed customer-centric practices throughout the organization, especially within teams managing direct customer interactions, ensuring alignment with the company’s unified mission.

Key Accountabilities:
Design and Build a Customer Experience Framework
• Develop and Implement the CX Strategy and framework, including principles for effective design, implementation, and management.
• Create customer journey maps, identify gaps and suggest improvement actions.
• Design customer feedback mechanism across multiple touch points
• Translate customer insights and business processes into CX management standards.
• Conduct research on CX best practices, methodologies, and industry trends to tailor practical standards for the organization.
• Define clear principles and measurable standards for customer experience management.
• Champion the framework across the organization by: Creating communication and training plans.
• Collaborating on the development of materials.
• Measuring training effectiveness and making improvements.
• Regularly evaluate and enhance the CX framework based on: Customer feedback and internal insights.
• Evolving market practices and trends.

Drive Execution and Continuous Improvement
• Establish governance mechanisms to monitor adherence to the CX framework.
• Collaborate with business units to measure, report, and improve CX performance across all channels.
• Ensure cohesive experience management across both online and offline touchpoints.

Data-Driven Insights and Analysis
• Support the development of systems and platforms for collecting, analyzing, and reporting customer experience data.
• Collaborate with relevant teams to analyze customer journeys and feedback.
• Identify and recommend initiatives to enhance CX, track implementation, and report on progress.
• Analyze customer interactions and insights to identify pain points and opportunities.

Other responsibilities
• Carry out additional duties as assigned by the Line Manager to support the overall success of the CX function.
Job Requirements:
Success Profile - Qualification and Experiences
Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Economics, or a related field.

Expertise
• Solid understanding of customer experience principles and/or market research methodologies.
• Familiarity with financial or life insurance products and services is preferred.

Experience
• Minimum of 2 years of experience in customer experience management, CX framework design, or customer research and analysis.

Language Proficiency
• Proficient in business-level English (spoken and written).

Title: Quality Engineer Lead (Up to 30 Months of Salary Annually)
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach $100 million of revenue in 2024, a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in just under 4 years. Our mission now is to harness the power of technology to develop a direct-to-consumer approach and enhance customer lifetime value.
We are looking for a skilled Quality Engineer Lead to join our team and ensure the delivery of high-quality software products. This role combines manual and automated testing expertise, technical acumen, and collaboration skills to maintain product excellence across the development lifecycle. As a full-stack QC Engineer, you will work closely with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to test and improve our systems, ensuring an exceptional user experience and alignment with business goals.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
Testing and Quality Assurance:
• Design, develop, and execute test plans and test cases to ensure comprehensive coverage of product requirements.
• Perform functional, integration, regression, and system testing for both frontend and backend systems.
• Create and maintain detailed reports on testing progress, defects, and outcomes.
• Review and refine test strategies to optimize quality and efficiency.
• Ensure cross-browser, cross-platform, and device compatibility for applications.
Automation Testing:
• Develop, implement, and maintain automated test scripts using tools like Cucumber, Serenity BDD, and Playwright.
• API testing is conducted using tools such as Postman and performance testing with JMeter.
• Collaborate with the DevOps team to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git.
• Leverage programming skills in Java or JavaScript to enhance testing frameworks.
Collaboration and Delivery:
• Collaborate with BAs, developers, and product managers to understand requirements, provide input, and ensure alignment.
• Act as a quality advocate, focusing on delivering features that meet user needs and maintain high standards.
• Evaluate product readiness and release timelines based on test results and team discussions.
Leadership and Influence:
• Share quality-focused practices and promote a quality-first mindset within the team.
• Mentor team members on testing techniques and workflows to enhance overall quality.
• Ensure workflows and processes are followed consistently and improve them when necessary.
Continuous Monitoring and Improvement:
• Monitor product performance and user feedback in production environments to identify improvement areas.
• Stay updated with industry trends, tools, and best practices to continually improve testing processes.
• Drive initiatives to improve product quality, user satisfaction, and team productivity.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
Education:
• Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field from a reputable university.
Experience:
• Minimum of 4 years of experience as a Software Tester or QC Engineer, with significant exposure to both manual and automated testing.
Technical Skills:
• Proficient in coding with the ability to learn and apply automation testing tools.
• Deep understanding of APIs/Web-services and familiarity with testing tools such as Postman, BrowserStack, and curl.
• Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies and practices like TDD/BDD.
Tools and Documentation:
• Proficient with Atlassian tools (Jira, Confluence) and mock-up tools (e.g., Figma, draw.io,..).
• Ability to write Software Development Requirement Documents and Functional Specifications.
• Experience with test automation frameworks (e.g., Playwright, Cucumber, cypress.io,..) is a plus.
Soft Skills:
• Excellent Problem-Solving skills and Critical Thinking.
• Outstanding Communication and Documentation skills.
• Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, Agile environment.
• Proactive and self-motivated with a strong sense of ownership.
Preferred (but not required)
• ISTQB certification or equivalent.
• Experience in the eCommerce industry.
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.
• Proficiency in English.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
Exceptional Total Compensation Package
• Up to 30 months of salary per year through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
• Full salary during probation & Guaranteed 13th month salary
• 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave, plus seniority paid leave
• Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members, plus annual health checkup
Growth Opportunities
• Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
• Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
Global Vision
• Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
• Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.

Title: Senior Data Engineer, Global E-Commerce Data Platform (Total Annual Compensation $40,000)
Company: Công Ty TNHH Công Nghệ Và Giải Pháp Phần Mềm Crossian
Location: Tầng 1, Toà nhà Pax Sky, 63 - 65 phố Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Join our Technology Innovations Center of Excellence (CoE) at Crossian, a fast-growing startup that achieved a milestone of $100M in 2024. In this dynamic role, you'll check in daily with your team to stay aligned on project goals and collaborate across our ecosystem with an Agile mindset infused with a unicorn-worthy startup culture.
We are building an E-commerce Data Platform following Lakehouse Architecture, leveraging Airflow, Airbyte, dbt, and Redshift on AWS Cloud. Our system is currently in the early development stage, providing a unique opportunity for you to be involved from the ground up—shaping the architecture, defining data pipelines, and implementing best practices. Here are some examples: Storefront, Payment Gateway, Inventory, Catalog, Logistics, Marketing Insights, CRM.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
We’re not just about building platforms; we’re about creating a workplace where talent thrives. Here's what you’ll gain:
Exceptional Compensation
• Up to 30 months of salary per year through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
• Total annual compensation $40,000, reflecting your expertise and contribution.
Growth Opportunities
• Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
• Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
Global Vision
• Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
• Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.
In addition to development tasks, you’ll collaborate closely with other CoEs to understand their unique challenges. With your technical expertise, you’ll continuously propose innovative solutions to elevate their performance and contribute to the overall success of the organization.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
1. Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL/ELT processes to collect, clean, and process large-scale datasets in data systems.
2. Collaborate with Data Scientists, Data Analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and develop Data Lake and Data Warehouse solutions for analytics, reporting, and AI/ML. Utilize BI tools like Grafana, AWS QuickSight, and Google Sheets for data visualization.
3. Build and optimize data architecture, including Lakehouse (AWS S3, Delta Lake), Data Warehouse (Redshift), and technologies like Kafka for both streaming and batch data processing.
4. Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues to ensure data integrity and timely delivery. Utilize tools such as Sentry, Grafana, Prometheus, and AWS CloudWatch to track logs and send alerts via Slack.
5. Document technical processes, maintain data catalogs, and ensure compliance with data governance policies. Use the Atlassian toolset (Jira, Confluence) or Slack for work management and team collaboration.
6. Optimize the performance, reliability, and cost-efficiency of data systems. Enhance the scalability and efficiency of all components, including Kafka, dbt, Airflow, Airbyte, and storage solutions like PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Redis, and AWS S3, as well as data processing and orchestration frameworks.
7. Continuously research and implement new technologies to optimize the current system, applying best practices in Data Engineering and DataOps.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
2. 4+ years of experience in data engineering, ETL development, or a similar role.
3. Proficiency in using advanced SQL queries to extract valuable insights from datasets.
4. Proficiency in one of the following programming languages: Python, C#, or Java for data processing and scripting.
5. Experience with relational databases, such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, or MS SQL Server.
6. Experience with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
7. Knowledge of data architecture concepts and cloud-based storage solutions.
8. Knowledge of document databases, including Elasticsearch, Redis, MongoDB, or Apache Solr.
9. Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
10. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, particularly in an Agile environment.
11. Proficient in English, with the ability to communicate, read, and write effectively in a professional work environment.

Preferred (but not required)
1. Knowledge of container orchestration, such as AWS EKS or Kubernetes.
2. Experience with microservice architecture.
3. Experience with data visualization tools, such as AWS QuickSight or Grafana.
4. Experience with data streaming platforms, such as Apache Kafka or Apache Nifi.
5. Familiarity with data integration from various sources, such as web services, APIs, and file systems.
6. Familiarity with the Agile toolset, such as GitLab, Jira, Confluence, and Slack.

Title: Junior Performance Marketing Specialist (Up-To $5000/month)
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Hà Nội, Vietnam, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in just under 3 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer lifetime value.
As our Junior Digital Performance Marketing, you'll be in charge of developing and executing performance-driven advertising campaigns across Meta, Google, Tiktok & Pinterest. Your expertise will be instrumental in optimizing campaigns, maximizing return on ad spend, and driving customer acquisition and retention. We're seeking someone with a strong background in performance marketing and a proven track record of achieving significant growth and driving results.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
1. Plan and execute performance marketing strategies on multiple digital platform to acquire customers and boost customer lifetime value.
2. Plan, set up, and optimize advertising campaigns effectively.
3. Dive deep into campaign data to identify key performance indicators (KPIs), track campaign success, and make data-driven decisions for optimization.
4. Collaborate closely with our creative, analytics, and product teams to ensure seamless campaign execution and cohesive messaging.
5. Keep your finger on the pulse of digital advertising trends, best practices, and changes in the ecosystem, so we can stay ahead of the curve.
6. Test and iterate ad creatives, signal segments, and campaign strategies to continuously improve performance and maximize return on investment.
7. Provide regular reports to stakeholders, sharing insights, highlighting successes, addressing challenges, and identifying optimization opportunities.
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
1. A bachelor's degree in Marketing, Accounting, Auditing, Finance, Data Analysis, Computer Science, IT, Mathematics, Economics, or a related field.
2. More than 1 year of experience in performance marketing, focus on conversion objective in Google, Facebook, or other ad network cho eCommerce / App, Games
3. Strong analytical skills and ability to extract valuable insights from data to optimize campaigns and deliver business outcomes.
4. Experience in the e-commerce industry or agency marketing is a plus.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
- Well-trained program by our marketing experts, from technical skills by our seniors to soft skills by our team leads and managers
- Clear & transparent career development and promotion opportunities, excel to team lead position within 1-2 years
- Attractive salary, bonus, fair and transparent scheme, income up to $5000/month (basic salary up to $1000 depending on capacity)
- Opportunities for internal rotation & master all key digital marketing platform from Google, Meta to Tiktok, Pinterest and many more
- Flexible, non-binding working time and space according to office hours
- Full salary during probation
- 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
- Global health insurance package for yourself
- Guaranteed 13th month salary
- Quarterly bonus & Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program
- A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
- Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events
- General company T&D Program
- Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws

Title: HSE Supervisor
Company: CÔNG TY TNHH CẢNG QUỐC TẾ TIL CẢNG HẢI PHÒNG
Location: Bến 3-4, khu phố Đôn Lương, Thị trấn Cát Hải, Hải Phòng, Đôn Lương, Cát Hải, Hải Phòng
Job Description:
JOB PURPOSE
Provide advice and support to the organization’s various departments to ensure the highest standards of Safety, Occupational Health, and the Environment for the normal development of the company’s operations.

MAIN TASKS
- Monitor field activities.
- Monitor fire system equipment.
- Monitor spill equipment in the field.
- Review of emergency equipment stock requirements.
- Monitor the proper segregation of hazardous materials.
- Make effective use of radio and official communication channels to process requests to other departments on HSE standards compliance.
- Monitor the order of the signage in the yard and its correct location.
- Conduct drills and training for HTIT staff and the brigade.
- Verify the implementation of field safety policies, protocols, and procedures.
- Monitor and evaluate the firefighting system network.
- Verify the implementation of policies, training, and monitoring for high-risk work (pedestrian safety, mobile equipment, cargo handling, work at height, engineering, insulation, confined spaces, handling of hazardous chemicals, hot work, hand and live tools, handling of pressurized gases, electrical hazards, excavations, among others).
- Update stock table of materials (Fire Protection, Spill Kit, PPE, and other accessories).
- Purchase required HSE equipment and follow up.
- Conduct training and induction instruction and registration.
- Conduct inspections of the terminal’s safety equipment (fire extinguishers, work-at-height equipment, rescue equipment, fire-fighting equipment, among others).
- Track accidents, incidents, inspections, and the implementation of corrective actions.
- Supervise own and third-party activities to ensure they are carried out in accordance with HTIT safety and environmental policies.
- Manage Safety, Occupational Health, and Environmental programs, monitor environmental impact studies, fire protection systems, field spill prevention equipment, and the proper placement and order of yard signage.
- Implement and comply with Dangerous Goods Procedures.
- Implement policies and training for operational and engineering work.
- Review of emergency equipment stock requirements.
- Planning of periodical environmental audit conducted by a third party
- Review and correction of periodical reports for submission to local authorities as per regulations
Job Requirements:
Knowledge, Experiences:
- Education: Safety/Industrial Engineer / Environment Specialization in subjects related to Safety
- Technical Knowledge Industrial Safety and Environmental Legislation
- Languages Intermediate knowledge of the English language Advanced Level of English
- Experience 3 years of experience in similar roles
- Others
• Ability to develop strong working relationships at all levels within the organization.(Knowledge of ISO 9001, 14001, 45001 process certification standards and international safety standards such as:)
• Leadership ability.(American OSHA, HSE UK, and OSHA Europe.)
• Logical reasoning and analysis.
• Conflict resolution.
• Proactivity.
• Effective communication.
• Dynamism and energy.
• Valid type B driver’s license.

General Environment:

Job Description:

Title: Quản Lý Thiết Kế (Lương Upto 23 Triệu)

Job Description:

- Kiểm soát hồ sơ thiết kế, kiến trúc, kết cấu về chất lượng, sự phù hợp và đồng bộ các dự án của Tập đoàn.

- Thiết kế bản vẽ chi tiết theo chỉ đạo của Ban lãnh đạo Công ty (nếu cần).
- Kiểm soát vật liệu thi công hoàn thiện khớp với bản vẽ thiết kế được duyệt.
- Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên trực tiếp.
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên Chuyên ngành: Kiến trúc, quy hoạch, xây dựng
Số năm kinh nghiệm:

- Có hiểu biết sâu về công trình Xanh.
- Nhanh nhẹn, cẩn thận, chính xác và chủ động trong công việc.
- Kỹ năng tổ chức và quản lý công việc tốt, tư duy sáng tạo.
- Làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm tốt.

** QUYỀN LỢI

- Được đào tạo bài bản trong một môi trường chuyên nghiệp và có cơ hội thăng tiến trong nghề nghiệp.

Title: Junior Frontend Developer
Company: CODEFORCE VINA
Location: 39 Hải Thượng Lãn ông, Phường 11, Quận 5, TP Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 7th floor Saigonbus building, 39 Hai Thuong Lan Ong street, Ward 11, District 5, Ho Chi Minh city
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:

• Work with the development team to design and develop intuitive user interfaces for web applications.
• Build responsive, user-friendly web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
• Create reusable and efficient frontend components with Next.js, React.js, and TypeScript.
• Implement UI frameworks such as Ant Design, MaterialUI, Bootstrap, or Tailwind CSS to enhance application aesthetics and functionality.
• Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize applications for performance and scalability.
• Collaborate with backend developers and UX designers to ensure smooth integration and exceptional user experiences.
• Participate in code reviews, identify and fix bugs, and provide constructive feedback to uphold code quality.
• Stay informed about the latest frontend development trends and continuously enhance your technical expertise.
Job Requirements:
• More than 1 year of professional experience (recent graduates welcome).
• Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
• Proficiency in Next.js, React.js and TypeScript.
• Familiarity with UI frameworks like Bootstrap, Ant Design, MaterialUI, Tailwind CSS, or Semantic UI.
• Understanding of responsive web design principles.
• Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
• Basic understanding of backend technologies and RESTful APIs.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
• Effective communication and teamwork skills, with basic proficiency in English (listening, speaking, reading, and writing).
• Ability to thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.
• Proactive, self-motivated, and eager to learn new technologies.
• Commitment to adopting web standards and best practices.
Salary & Benefits
At Codeforce, we offer a competitive salary aligned with the Ho Chi Minh City market, with
performance-based appraisals and bonuses. Our comprehensive benefits package includes:
• Attractive base salary with annual profit-sharing bonuses.
• Social insurance and premium PVI healthcare coverage for you and your family.
• Free parking.
• Modern, vibrant workplace with complimentary snacks, coffee, and tea.
• Monthly team-building and social events.
• Opportunities for growth, recognition, and professional development.
Why Join Us?
At Codeforce, we value creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning. You’ll work on exciting
projects, gain hands-on experience with modern technologies, and be part of a fun, supportive team.Join us to kickstart your career and grow into a versatile developer in an environment that celebrates your contributions

Title: Marketing Manager
Company: Thai Hung corp
Location: Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam, Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Chức danh: Trưởng phòng Marketing
Đơn vị: Phòng Marketing
Địa điểm làm việc: Văn phòng Công ty Cổ phần Thái Bình Hưng Thịnh

A. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
I. Mô tả công việc
Chịu trách nhiệm xây dựng chiến lược thương hiệu và kế hoạch truyền thông tổng thể; triển khai các hoạt động marketing nhằm nâng cao nhận diện thương hiệu, thúc đẩy doanh số bán hàng và mở rộng thị trường cho các sản phẩm xe điện của công ty.

II. Nhiệm vụ
1. Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược Marketing
- Lập kế hoạch Marketing ngắn hạn và dài hạn phù hợp với định hướng kinh doanh của công ty.
- Thiết lập định vị thương hiệu, chiến lược truyền thông tích hợp (IMC) và kế hoạch ngân sách marketing hàng năm.

2. Quản lý đội ngũ và phát triển nhân sự
- Tuyển dụng, đào tạo, phân công công việc và đánh giá hiệu suất nhân sự phòng Marketing.
- Xây dựng hệ thống quy trình làm việc, kiểm soát tiến độ và chất lượng triển khai các chiến dịch.

3. Triển khai truyền thông thương hiệu & sản phẩm
- Lên ý tưởng và tổ chức thực hiện các chiến dịch quảng cáo online/offline, PR, tổ chức sự kiện và truyền thông nội bộ.
- Quản lý nội dung trên các kênh truyền thông chính thức: Website, mạng xã hội, showroom, tài liệu bán hàng,...

4. Phối hợp phát triển doanh số & hỗ trợ bán hàng
- Làm việc chặt chẽ với phòng Kinh doanh để hỗ trợ các chương trình khuyến mãi, ra mắt sản phẩm, phát triển tệp khách hàng tiềm năng.
- Xây dựng bộ nhận diện thương hiệu, tài liệu đào tạo sản phẩm, thông điệp bán hàng (USP).

5. Phân tích thị trường và báo cáo hiệu quả
- Nghiên cứu xu hướng thị trường, đối thủ, hành vi người tiêu dùng.
- Theo dõi hiệu quả các hoạt động Marketing, đánh giá ROI và đề xuất giải pháp tối ưu ngân sách.
Job Requirements:
III.Yêu cầu năng lực:
Trình độ học vấn:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Marketing, Truyền thông, Quản trị kinh doanh hoặc liên quan..
Kỹ năng:
- Tư duy chiến lược, khả năng xây dựng thương hiệu và dẫn dắt chiến dịch.
- Kỹ năng lãnh đạo, làm việc nhóm, tư duy phân tích dữ liệu marketing.
- Thành thạo các công cụ digital marketing, thiết kế cơ bản và phần mềm báo cáo.
Kinh nghiệm:
- Tối thiểu 3–5 năm trong lĩnh vực marketing, trong đó có ít nhất 2 năm ở vị trí quản lý hoặc trưởng nhóm.
- Ưu tiên ứng viên từng triển khai marketing cho các ngành hàng tiêu dùng, thiết bị công nghiệp hoặc phương tiện di chuyển (xe điện, ô tô…).

IV. Kpi & Tiêu chí đánh giá:
1. Tăng trưởng nhận diện thương hiệu
- Tăng ≥ 30% lượt tiếp cận kênh truyền thông so với quý trước.

2. Hiệu quả chiến dịch
- Đạt ≥ 80% mục tiêu từng chiến dịch (theo KPIs định lượng đã đặt ra).

3. Hỗ trợ doanh số
- ≥ 15% doanh số quý có liên kết với chiến dịch marketing đang triển khai.

4. Quản lý ngân sách
- Tối ưu chi phí marketing theo định mức kế hoạch (< 5% lệch so với ngân sách).

5. Chất lượng nội dung và thương hiệu
- ≥ 90% tài liệu, nội dung truyền thông được phê duyệt đúng hạn & chuẩn hóa.

6. Hiệu suất đội ngũ
- ≥ 80% nhân sự trong phòng hoàn thành mục tiêu cá nhân.

Title: Nhân Viên Bán Hàng Quốc Tế Trên Alibaba.com Mức Lương Lên Đến 25Tr
Company: Injae VINA CO., LTD

• Tư vấn và hỗ trợ khách hàng quốc tế trong việc mua sắm qua nền tảng ALIBABA.COM.
• Đàm phán và thương lượng với khách hàng để đạt được thỏa thuận có lợi cho cả hai bên.
• Phát triển và duy trì mối quan hệ tốt với khách hàng hiện tại và tiềm năng.
• Xử lý các yêu cầu và khiếu nại của khách hàng một cách chuyên nghiệp và nhanh chóng.
• Theo dõi xu hướng thị trường và hoạt động cạnh tranh để đề xuất các chiến lược bán hàng phù hợp.
• Thực hiện các báo cáo bán hàng và phân tích kết quả để cải thiện hiệu suất.
• Hợp tác với các phòng ban khác để đảm bảo quy trình làm việc hiệu quả.
Địa chỉ làm việc: Số 23, đường B4 an lợi đông, thủ đức, HCM
Job Requirements:
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp tiếng Anh tốt.
• Kinh nghiệm bán hàng ít nhất 1 năm.
• Kỹ năng thương lượng và thuyết phục.
• Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập và quản lý thời gian hiệu quả.
• Kiến thức về thương mại điện tử và thị trường quốc tế.
• Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề và xử lý tình huống.
• Khả năng làm việc dưới áp lực và đạt được mục tiêu đề ra.
Yêu cầu kinh nghiệm
- Tối thiểu 1 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực bán hàng hoặc liên quan.
- Kinh nghiệm làm việc trong môi trường thương mại điện tử là một lợi thế.
Phù hợp văn hóa:
- Chúng tôi tìm kiếm những ứng viên có tinh thần đồng đội, khả năng thích ứng nhanh với thay đổi và mong
muốn không ngừng học hỏi. Nếu bạn là người thân thiện, chủ động và sẵn sàng tham gia vào một môi
trường làm việc đổi mới, bạn sẽ phù hợp với văn hóa của chúng tôi
Phúc lợi công ty:
- Chúng tôi khuyến khích môi trường làm việc tích cực và hỗ trợ nhân viên trong việc phát triển sự nghiệp.
- Nhân viên được đóng 100% bảo hiểm và công đoàn
- Tháng lương cơ bản thứ 13
- Du lịch trong nước và quốc tế hằng năm
- 14 ngày nghỉ phép hằng năm
- Hưởng toàn bộ ngày nghỉ lễ, phép 100% lương thoả thuận và theo luật lao động

Title: Sales & Marketing Manager (Healthcare)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Seadent
Location: 13 Đặng Tất, Tân Định, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 13 Đặng Tất, Phường Tân Định, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
I. JOB DESCRIPTION
1. Business & Marketing Planning and Execution

2. Strategic Partnership Development and Maintenance
- Implement collaboration programs with universities, hospitals, and other relevant organizations.

- Dynamic and professional environment working.
- Intensive training program

- Experience in B2B Sales Management (>5 years) in business development
- Excellent negotiation, and communication skills
- Visionary with analytical & strategic thinking
- Expert communicator in both Vietnamese and English with impactful presentation abilities
- Effective partnership builder with influential communication skills, strong leadership and managerial capabilities
- Excellent interpersonal skills with positive attitude and maturity

Title: Indoor Furniture Designer
Company: Greenmore Vietnam Co., Ltd
Location: 2nd Floor, BW Supply Chain City Office Building, No.1 Tien Phong 3 Street, Binh Duong Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam., 2nd Floor, BW Supply Chain City Office Building, No.1 Tien Phong 3 Street, Binh Duong Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
Job Description:
Job Summary:
We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented Indoor Furniture Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing innovative, stylish, and functional indoor furniture pieces that align with our brand identity and customer needs. You will collaborate closely with the product development, engineering, and marketing teams to bring designs from concept to final product.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design indoor furniture collections based on current trends, customer needs, and brand direction.
• Develop detailed design concepts, including sketches, 3D models, mood boards, and material selection.
• Create technical drawings/specifications for prototyping and production.
• Work closely with R&D and engineering teams to ensure feasibility and cost-effectiveness.
• Research materials, finishes, and construction techniques to ensure quality, sustainability, and innovation.
• Stay up-to-date with market trends, consumer behavior, and competitor products.
• Present design concepts and prototypes to internal teams and stakeholders.
• Ensure compliance with industry standards, safety regulations, and ergonomic principles.
• Make adjustments to designs based on feedback from prototyping, testing, or customer input.
Job Requirements:
• Degree in Industrial Design, Furniture Design, Interior Design, or related field.
• Proven experience in indoor furniture design (portfolio required).
• Proficiency in design software such as AutoCAD, Rhino, SolidWorks, SketchUp, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar.
• Strong understanding of materials, construction methods, and manufacturing processes.
• Excellent sketching and visualization skills.
• Good communication and teamwork abilities.
• Detail-oriented with a strong sense of aesthetics and functionality.
• Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

Title: Chief Accountant
Company: Thai Hung corp
Location: Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam, Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Job Title: Chief Accountant
Department: Accounting Department
Work place: Office of Thai Binh Hung Thinh Joint Stock Company

A. JOB DESCRIPTION
I. Job Description
Responsible for overseeing all accounting and financial operations of the company, ensuring the accounting system operates efficiently, transparently, in compliance with legal regulations, and providing financial management support to the executive board.

II. Key Responsibilities
1. Accounting operations management
- Organize, assign tasks, and supervise all activities within the accounting department.
- Review and ensure accounting entries are compliant with current accounting standards and regulations.
- Develop and improve accounting procedures and policies tailored to the company's operations.

2. Financial & accounting reporting
- Prepare and oversee periodic financial reports (monthly, quarterly, annually).
- Analyze financial performance, provide early warnings, and propose solutions to the executive board.
- Ensure accounting data accurately and promptly reflects the company’s financial position.

3. Tax compliance & legal regulations
- Review and verify tax declarations, including VAT, CIT, and PIT.
- Liaise with tax authorities, auditors, and financial institutions when required.
- Ensure full compliance with financial and accounting regulations and laws.

4. Budgeting & cost control
- Develop the annual budget and monitor implementation across departments.
- Control expenditures, manage cash flow, and optimize financial efficiency.
- Coordinate and propose funding plans and manage credit lines with financial institutions.

5. Accounting team development
- Train and provide professional guidance for accounting staff.
- Evaluate staff performance and contribute to the development of a high-performing accounting team.
Job Requirements:
III. Job Requirements
Knowledge:
- Graduated from reputable universities such as National Economics University, Foreign Trade University, Academy of Finance, or University of Industry with a major in Accounting or Finance.
Skill:
- Proficient in accounting and tax practices; solid knowledge of current Vietnamese accounting standards and financial regulations.
- Strong leadership, data analysis, problem-solving, and risk management mindset.
- Skilled in accounting software (MISA/FAST) and advanced Excel; ERP experience is a strong advantage.
- Excellent communication skills and ability to coordinate effectively with cross-functional departments (Sales, Operations, HR, etc.).
Experience:
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in general accounting, including at least 2 years in the position of Chief Accountant or equivalent.

IV. Kpi & Evaluation Criteria
1. Timely Financial Reporting
- 100% of internal, tax, and audited financial reports submitted on time.

2. Accuracy of Books and Documentation
- ≤ 1% error rate detected in internal audits or external financial reviews.

3. Operational Cost Management
- Ensure expenditures remain within approved budget; discrepancies ≥ 3% must be identified and addressed.

4. Accounts Receivable Management
- ≥ 95% of outstanding receivables are collected or resolved within due dates.

5. Compliance Control
- No major violations related to tax, social insurance, or audit regulations.

6. Data & Reporting Continuity
- At least one accounting staff member is trained and rotated in accordance with succession and development plans.

Title: Talent Development Manager
Company: CÔNG TY TNHH SẢN XUẤT VÀ THƯƠNG MẠI QUÂN ĐẠT
Location: 536 Quang Trung, phường 11, Gò Vấp, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 536 Quang Trung, Ward 11, Go Vap Dist., Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Job Description:
Talent Search
- Plan and implement recruitment activities based on headcount planning and production/business needs.
- Develop and improve the recruitment process, from job descriptions to probation evaluation.
- Expand and optimize recruitment channels, especially for workers/technicians (vocational schools, job centers, internal referrals, etc.).
- Participate in employer branding activities such as job fairs, career talkshows, and recruitment communications.
- Analyze recruitment data, assess effectiveness, and propose improvements.
- Support hiring for special cases: mass recruitment, strategic positions, or overseas markets.

Human Development
- Build annual competency development plans for different levels using appropriate methods.
- Design and deliver training programs or coordinate with external trainers.
- Propose development programs for key staff and succession pipelines.
- Contribute to the implementation of competency frameworks, IDPs, and promote a learning & continuous improvement culture.

Strategic resource orientation
- Participate in developing and adjusting HR strategy aligned with business direction.
- Work alongside leadership in organizational design, structure optimization, and performance/reward mechanism improvement.
- Utilize people analytics to provide insights and strategic feedback.
- Act as a change agent to support departments in adapting to new structures, policies, or development directions.

Management and System
- Develop and update procedures, policies, and forms related to talent acquisition and development.
- Manage budgets effectively and optimize available resources.
- Prepare periodic reports and propose improvement initiatives.
- Maintain data systems and employee records to support analysis and decision-making.
Job Requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources Management, Economics, Education, or related fields.
- At least 10 years of experience in Human Resources, including 5 years in a management role or specializing in recruitment and training at companies with over 300 employees.
- Strong planning, organizational, internal communication, and cross-functional collaboration skills.
- Experience in recruiting technical and production positions is an advantage.
- People development mindset with a solid understanding of practical workforce needs in manufacturing environments.
- Preference given to candidates with experience in manufacturing, construction, or engineering industries.
- Good English communication skills.

Title: Sales Executive
Company: Thai Hung corp
Location: Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam, Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Job Title: Sales Executive
Department: Sales Department
Work place: Office of Thai Binh Hung Thinh Joint Stock Company

A. JOB DESCRIPTION:
I. Job Description:
Responsible for identifying, approaching, and maintaining potential customers; introducing the company's electric vehicle products; consulting, negotiating, closing deals; coordinating order processing and monitoring customer receivables.

II. Key Responsibilities:
1. Customer Acquisition & Relationship Management
- Build a list of potential clients in tourism, industrial zones, golf courses, urban areas, resorts, etc.
- Reach out via direct visits, phone calls, emails, and social media.
- Maintain regular communication, build relationships, and update customer needs.

2. Product Presentation & Deal Negotiation
- Advise customers on suitable electric vehicle models based on their needs.
- Deliver product presentations, arrange test drives, and organize factory visits if needed.
- Prepare quotations, negotiate payment and delivery terms, and finalize orders.

3. Order Processing Coordination
- Work with warehouse, accounting, and logistics teams to ensure order fulfillment.
- Track production and delivery progress, and update customers accordingly.

4. Reporting
- Update customer information and order status in the internal management system.
-Submit weekly/monthly/quarterly sales reports in the prescribed format.

5. Receivables Follow-up
- Monitor each customer’s payment schedule.
- Coordinate with accounting and clients to ensure on-time collection and avoid financial risks.
Job Requirements:
II. Job Requirements:
Knowledge:
- Bachelor’s degree or higher in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or related fields.
Skill:
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word); CRM experience is a plus.
- Strong organizational skills and flexible problem-solving ability.
Experience:
- Preferably 1+ year of experience in sales of technical equipment, vehicles, electric vehicles, or industrial machinery.
- Basic understanding of contract, delivery, payment, and warranty processes is an advantage.

IV. KPIs & Evaluation Criteria:
1. Sales Revenue
- Achieve ≥ 90% of monthly/quarterly sales target.

2. New Customer Acquisition
- Reach ≥ 30 potential clients per month.

3. Conversion Rate
- ≥ 15% of total approached customers converted to sales.

4. Order Fulfillment Progress
- ≥ 95% of orders fulfilled on schedule.

5. Customer Debt Status
- ≥ 95% of receivables collected on time.

6. Data & Reporting
- 100% of reports submitted on time, with complete and accurate data.

Title: Procurement Specialist Capex & MRO
Company: Perfetti Van Melle (Viet Nam) Limited
Location: Lot N, Street No.26, Song Than Industrial Zone No.2, Di An District, Binh Duong Province, Lot N, Street No.26, Song Than Industrial Zone No.2, Di An District, Binh Duong Province
Job Description:
BASIC PURPOSE OF THE POSITION:
Responsible for entire process of procurement of direct materials in according to Purchasing policies and guidelines to ensure the production continuity of Perfetti Van Melle Vietnam (PVN) while meeting the Company and Corporate driven goals on cost, quality and service.

OPERATING ENVIRONMENT:
Perfetti Van Melle (PVM) is a privately owned company that manufactures and distributes confectionery and chewing gum in more than 150 countries. PVM is a global leader in the confectionery industry, thanks to delighting consumers around the world with its innovative, diverse and most loved products.
The company boasts a diverse portfolio of iconic local and internationally recognized brands cherished by generations such as Happydent, Mentos, Chupa Chups, Alpenliebe, Airheads, Center, Fruit-tella, Big Babol, Vivident, Golia, Vigorsol, Smint and Frisk. In addition, Trident, Hollywood, Dentyne, Stimorol, V6 and Bubblicious in the United States, Canada, and Europe.

PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES AND EXPECTED END RESULT
1. Capex & MRO Procurement Management
• Manage the procurement of parts and equipment for Capex and MRO, including consumables, bearings, belts, electrical components, and other maintenance supplies for production equipment.
• Source and purchase overseas parts and equipment, ensuring timely delivery and compliance with technical specifications.
• Ensure the availability of parts and equipment to support uninterrupted production and maintenance activities.
2. Cross-Functional Collaboration
• Work closely with Production, Maintenance, Engineering, and EHS teams to understand Capex and MRO procurement needs and provide timely solutions.
• Coordinate with Finance to manage budgets and report on parts and equipment expenditures.
• Support Engineering in sourcing parts that meet technical specifications for Capex projects.
3. Supplier and Contract Management
• Identify and evaluate suppliers for Capex and MRO parts and equipment, ensuring they meet quality, cost, and delivery standards.
• Coordinate with suppliers to place orders, track deliveries, and resolve issues related to overseas shipments.
• Monitor supplier performance through KPIs (e.g., on-time delivery, quality compliance) and provide feedback to the Procurement Associate Manager.
• Assist in managing supplier contracts, ensuring compliance with company policies and timely updates.
4. Cost Optimization and Budget Management
• Support the development and management of budgets for Capex and MRO parts procurement, ensuring alignment with financial goals.
• Analyze spend data to identify cost-saving opportunities and propose initiatives to reduce expenses without compromising quality.
• Track and report on savings achieved through procurement activities to the Procurement Associate Manager.
5. Compliance and Risk Management
• Ensure all Capex and MRO procurement activities comply with company policies, ethical standards, and local regulations.
• Conduct basic due diligence on suppliers to mitigate risks related to quality, delivery, and compliance.
• Assist in implementing contingency plans to address potential supply chain disruptions or equipment shortages.
6. Reporting and Process Improvement
• Provide reports on Capex and MRO procurement activities, including spend analysis, supplier performance, and delivery updates, to the Procurement Associate Manager.
• Identify inefficiencies in the procurement process for parts and equipment and suggest improvements to enhance operational effectiveness.
• Utilize procurement tools and systems to streamline processes and improve visibility into Capex and MRO activities.
Job Requirements:
A) Education, Qualifications and Training:
• Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Mechanical, Electrical, or Industrial), Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
• A professional certification (e.g., CPM, CSCP, or CIPS) is preferred..

B) Experience required (e.g. Past Roles, Level, Years of Experience, Technical, People Management, etc.):
• 2-4 years of experience in procurement, with at least 2 years focused on Capex and MRO procurement.
• Proven experience in a manufacturing or FMCG (Fast-Moving Consumer Goods) environment with a strong technical background in engineering or production operations.

C) Specialised Knowledge or Skills required (e.g. Technical, Cross-functional, etc.):
1. Technical Skills:
• Strong understanding of Capex and MRO procurement processes, with a focus on technical specifications and requirements.
• Proficiency in ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle, or similar) and E-Sourcing systems (e.g., Ariba).
• Advanced skills in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) for data analysis and reporting.
• Familiarity with spend analysis tools and contract management software.
2. Soft Skills:
• Excellent Problem solving and stakeholder management skills to build relationships with suppliers and internal teams.
• Strong analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
• Exceptional organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.
• Proactive on lean management & continuous improvement.
3. Language:
• Fluency in English and Vietnamese (both written and spoken)

Title: Giám Đốc Phát Triển Dự Án BĐS
Company: Navigos Search
Location: Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Hanoi / HCMC
Job Description:
- Điều phối toàn bộ quá trình chuẩn bị, triển khai, kiểm soát và phối hợp các bên liên quan – từ ngân hàng, nhà đầu tư, nhà thầu, đến chính quyền địa phương.
- Làm việc trực tiếp và hiệu quả với các cơ quan nhà nước (UBND, Sở KHĐT, Sở TNMT, Sở Xây dựng, Sở GTVT, PCCC, cấp điện – cấp nước – thoát nước...) để thực hiện các thủ tục pháp lý trong toàn bộ vòng đời dự án:
 • Xin chủ trương đầu tư, quy hoạch, giấy phép xây dựng
 • Pháp lý đất đai, chuyển mục đích sử dụng, giao đất/thuê đất
 • Thẩm định thiết kế cơ sở, đấu nối hạ tầng, môi trường, PCCC
 • Kiểm tra, nghiệm thu và bàn giao công trình
Job Requirements:
• Có 5 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên trong phát triển dự án bất động sản đô thị hoặc khu phức hợp
• Có kinh nghiệm trực tiếp làm việc với cơ quan nhà nước trong quá trình hoàn thiện các thủ tục pháp lý của dự án xây dựng là điểm cộng mạnh
• Hiểu rõ quy trình pháp lý đầu tư – đất đai – xây dựng – PCCC – môi trường và có khả năng chủ động đề xuất giải pháp phù hợp quy định hiện hành
• Tư duy hệ thống, có khả năng tiếp cận mô hình quản trị thông minh, tích hợp công nghệ
• Có năng lực “giữ nhịp” nhiều bên trong môi trường biến động cao
• Tự tin điều hành nhưng biết chia sẻ quyền lực, chuẩn bị cho quy mô mở rộng
• Giao tiếp linh hoạt, kiên trì và chiến lược khi làm việc với các cơ quan quản lý nhà nước, có khả năng chuẩn bị hồ sơ và bảo vệ phương án đầu tư

PHẨM CHẤT & TIỀM NĂNG
 • Có năng lực “giữ nhịp” nhiều bên trong môi trường biến động cao

Title: Trưởng Phòng Cung Ứng
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Ngôi Sao Thiên Hà
Location: 87 Láng Hạ, Phường Thành Công, Hà Nội, Số 87, Láng Hạ, Ba Đình, Hà Nội
Job Description:
1. TRÁCH NHIỆM CHUNG
• Chịu trách nhiệm trước Ban Giám đốc về hoạt động Mua hàng và Cung ứng phục vụ cho sản xuất kinh doanh của Công ty;
• Lập kế hoạch, tổ chức thực hiện và báo cáo kết quả thực hiện công việc của phòng Cung ứng theo yêu cầu của Giám đốc.
• Tìm kiếm nhà phân phối để cung cấp hàng hóa đúng, đủ theo nhu cầu của các phòng/bộ phận trong Công ty;
• Chịu trách nhiệm quản lý, vận hành phòng Cung ứng nhằm đạt được mục tiêu, hiệu quả công việc theo yêu cầu Công ty đề ra;
• Giám sát việc thực hiện công việc của nhân viên trong phòng.
2. NHIỆM VỤ
2.1. Chịu trách nhiệm trước Ban Giám đốc về hoạt động Mua hàng và Cung ứng phục vụ cho sản xuất kinh doanh của Công ty
- Tham mưu cho Giám Đốc trong công tác hoạch định kế hoạch mua hàng, cung ứng phục vụ hoạt động sản xuất kinh doanh và tổ chức điều hành kho của Công ty.
- Xem xét, đề xuất và thực hiện các yêu cầu mua hàng hóa hay dịch vụ đáp ứng cho hoạt động SXKD trên cơ sở Giám Đốc đã phê duyệt một cách nhanh chóng, chủ động và hiệu quả.
2.2. Công việc cung cấp hàng hóa
- Kiểm tra chất lượng và tiến độ cung ứng của toàn bộ vật lực đầu vào phục vụ cho hoạt động sản xuất kinh doanh toàn Công ty.
- Tìm hiểu về sản phẩm đề nghị: tính năng, kích thước, đặc điểm, mục đích sử dụng…
2.3. Quản lý các công việc với nhà cung cấp
- Quản lý các nhà cung ứng theo qui định của Công ty theo các chỉ tiêu: năng lực, sản phẩm, thời gian giao hàng, dịch vụ hậu mãi, phương pháp thanh toán,…
- Tìm nhà cung cấp, yêu cầu báo giá, tập hợp báo giá, gửi để xuất lựa chọn nhà phân phối.
- Kiểm soát các Hợp đồng ký kết với các nhà cung cấp.
2.4. Phối hợp với bộ phận Kế toán trong các công việc liên quan
- Thông qua kế toán về danh sách, giá trị hàng lấy hóa đơn VAT và những điều kiện về thanh toán (nếu có).
- Lên danh mục tiền, hàng của phòng để làm tạm ứng, thanh toán tiền mua hàng với Kế toán.
- Kết hợp với kế toán đối chiếu và giải quyết công nợ về hàng hóa của Công ty.
2.5 Quản lý nhân viên phòng Cung ứng
- Quản lý nhân sự, điều động, phân công công việc, sắp xếp nhân sự của phòng Cung ứng.
- Đào tạo về kỹ năng chuyên môn, hướng dẫn nghiệp vụ, tác phong làm việc chuyên nghiệp cho nhân viên. Đề xuất cho nhân viên tham gia các khóa đào tạo do công ty tổ chức hoặc đào tạo bên ngoài.
- Xem xét, ký duyệt đánh giá sau thời gian thử việc/đánh giá hàng tháng của cán bộ nhân viên phòng Cung ứng
- Đề xuất tuyển dụng các vị trí nhân sự trong phòng.
- Xây dựng môi trường làm việc lành mạnh, năng động, trách nhiệm và hiệu quả.
2.6. Công việc khi phát sinh Tiệc/ sự kiện
- Tập hợp thông báo tiệc để phối hợp với bộ phận tiệc lên phương án chốt lại lượng hàng và thời gian hàng về, đặc điểm của hàng.
- Tổng hợp hàng tồn kho, mua hàng tiệc, lên danh mục hàng đặt, hàng mua theo ngày giờ đã chốt.
- Duyệt thanh toán mua hàng và đặt hàng theo danh mục.
- Kiểm soát việc nhận hàng, giao hàng và nhập kho.
- Thanh toán NCC trực tiếp hoặc theo dõi công nợ.
- Thực hiện hoàn ứng với kế toán theo đúng quy định.
2.7. Thực hiện các công việc khác do Ban Giám đốc phân công.
2.8. Báo cáo kịp thời, đầy đủ, chính xác các thông tin liên quan đến công việc cho Ban Giám đốc định kỳ, hoặc đột xuất theo yêu cầu.
Job Requirements:
1. Năng lực chuyên môn
• Trình độ học vấn: tốt nghiệp Đại học.
• Trình độ chuyên môn: chuyên ngành Quản lý chuỗi cung ứng, Quản trị kinh doanh, Kinh tế,…
• Kinh nghiệm: tối thiểu 05 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương.
2. Kỹ năng
• Kỹ năng lãnh đạo, điều hành, quản lý tốt.
• Kỹ năng phân tích và dự báo thị trường.
• Có tầm nhìn chiến lược, khả năng hoạch định tốt.
• Có sự am hiểu về nghiệp vụ nhập, xuất hàng hóa.
• Chịu được áp lực công việc.
3. Phẩm chất cá nhân
• Trung thực, nhiệt tình, nhanh nhạy, tháo vát
• Đam mê, có trách nhiệm với công việc.
4. Yêu cầu khác
• Ngoại hình: ưa nhìn.
• Giọng nói: dễ nghe, phát âm chuẩn.
• Sức khỏe: tốt.

Title: Nhân Viên Kinh Doanh (Nam)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Sài Gòn Công Nghệ Nước (Sawatech)
Location: Số 47, Đường số 12 Khu Đô Thị Mới Him Lam, Phường Tân Hưng, TP Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Số 47, Đường số 12 Khu Đô Thị Mới Him Lam, Phường Tân Hưng, TP Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Công ty Cổ phần Sài Gòn Công Nghệ Nước (SAWATECH) là nhà phân phối thiết bị ngành cấp -thoát nước, thủy lợi, công nghiệp, và thi công lắp đặt cơ khí dự án thoát nước, thủy lợi…

Hơn 20 năm thành lập và phát triển, hiện có hơn 50 nhân sự làm việc tại 4 văn phòng và trung tâm dịch vụ tại TP HCM, Hà Nội, Đà Nẳng. Sự thành công mà Sawatech đang có chính là những con người được kết nối bằng các giá trị cốt lõi, được đào tạo để phát triển, đãi ngộ xứng đáng, an tâm về cuộc sống. Với những định hướng và kế hoạch phát triển sắp tới nên chúng tôi cần gia nhập thêm vị trí như sau:

NHÂN VIÊN KINH DOANH (Nam)
Mô tả công việc:
+ Xây dựng và thực hiện và quản lý kế hoạch kinh doanh, đảm bảo hoàn thành chỉ tiêu được giao theo từng tháng/quý/năm.
+ Tiếp tục chăm sóc và phát triển mối quan hệ với khách hàng cũ mà công ty hiện có.
+ Tìm kiếm, thiết lập, duy trì và phát triển mối quan hệ với các khách hàng mới.
+ Tư vấn, báo giá thiết bị, đàm phán hợp đồng khách hàng.
+ Bán hàng theo dự án.
+ Chi tiết khác về công việc sẽ được thảo luận trong quá trình phỏng vấn.

Quyền lợi:
+ Có cơ hội được đào tạo bởi nhà sản xuất, chuyên gia nước ngoài;
+ Chế độ làm việc lâu dài;
+ Hoa hồng bán hàng cho từng dự án / đơn hàng.
+ Môi trường làm việc tốt, năng động, có cơ hội thăng tiến;
+ BHYT, BHXH, BHTN theo qui định của nhà nước và một số chế độ ưu đãi khác.
Các ứng cử viên vui lòng nộp hồ sơ trực tiếp hoặc gửi email trong vòng 30 ngày, kể từ ngày đăng tuyển tại:
Số 47, Đường số 12 Khu Đô Thị Mới Him Lam, Phường Tân Hưng, TP Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam.

Title: Showroom Supervisor
Company: Thai Hung corp
Location: Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam, Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam
Job Description:
I.Job Description:
Responsible for managing showroom operations, ensuring brand image, in-store sales consultation, product display management, sales staff supervision, and revenue performance at the assigned location.

II.Key Responsibilities:
1. Showroom Operations Management
- Organize daily showroom activities: opening, cleanliness, product arrangement.
- Ensure display standards, brand identity, and customer experience are met.
2. In-store Sales & Customer Service
- Directly welcome, consult, and persuade customers to purchase products.
- Record orders, coordinate delivery, and follow up with after-sales care.
3. Sales Staff Management
- Assign work shifts and monitor individual performance.
- Provide guidance on consultation techniques, handle customer issues, and conduct product training sessions.
4. Revenue Assurance & Reporting
- Prepare monthly/quarterly sales plans and ensure execution.
- Consolidate sales reports, customer volume, and conversion rates to report to the Sales Manager.
5. Marketing & Event Coordination
- Support promotional campaigns and in-showroom experience events.
- Propose ideas to improve customer service at the point of sale.
Job Requirements:
Knowledge: College/University degree in Business, Marketing, Management, or related fields.

Skill:
- Strong communication, persuasive selling, and customer complaint resolution.
- Good sense of layout and scientific product display.
- Basic proficiency in Excel, POS systems, and sales management software.
Experience:
- Minimum 2 years in store/showroom management or retail supervision.
- Preference for candidates with experience in electric vehicles, tech equipment, or electronics.

Title: R&D Engineer
Company: Thai Hung corp
Location: Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam, Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Job Title: R&D Engineer
Department: R&D Department
Work place: Office of Thai Binh Hung Thinh Joint Stock Company

I.Job Description:
Participate in the design, research, and improvement of products throughout the stages of simulation – modeling – detailed design – testing of components such as chassis, electrical systems, interiors, vehicle body, etc., using 3D CAD software. Coordinate with the production department to bring products into mass production.

II. Key Responsibilities:
1. Technical Design
- Design 3D components for mechanical parts, chassis, electrical–electronic modules, interiors.
- Create models, assembly drawings, and detailed drawings using CAD software.

2. Technical Improvement & Testing Support
- Improve existing vehicle models: enhance durability and optimize components.
- Collaborate on testing and troubleshooting prototype errors.

3. Technology Transfer Coordination
- Receive design packages from partners (China, Japan).
- Support testing and act as a technical bridge.

4. Supervision of Maintenance & Safety
- Develop periodic maintenance plans for all production machinery and equipment.
- Inspect and approve repair/replacement requests.
- Supervise compliance with labor safety, fire prevention, and environmental standards.

5. Technical Documentation
- Prepare BOMs, assembly manuals, and technical specifications.
- Manage drawing data and ensure proper storage and updates.

6. New Product Development
- Provide technical design feedback during the development of new models.
- Coordinate with departments during the product R&D process.
Job Requirements:
III. Job Requirements:
Knowledge:
- Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronics, Industrial Design, or equivalent.
Skill:
- Proficient in 3D CAD design software: SolidWorks, NX, Inventor, AutoCAD, etc.
- Systematic thinking, strong data organization, effective team collaboration.
Experience:
- Preference for candidates with experience in electric vehicle design, special-purpose vehicles, or industrial machinery.

IV. KPIs & Evaluation Criteria:
1. Design Progress
- ≥90% of design tasks (weekly/monthly) completed on schedule.
- Design sets submitted on time with supervisor confirmation.

2. Drawing Quality
- Post-release technical error rate ≤ 2%.
- No serious errors affecting assembly, trial production, or causing line downtime.

3. Improvement Proposals
- Minimum 1 technical, design, or process improvement proposal per month with clear presentation.
- Preference for cost-saving, design simplification, or manufacturability improvement ideas.

4. Trial Production Coordination
- ≥95% technical responses (related to drawings, components, specifications) provided within 24 hours.
- Present and actively support during inspections, trial assemblies, and technical acceptance at the workshop.

5. Technical Coordination and Production Support
- 100% of products/prototypes have complete documentation: 2D–3D drawings, BOM, assembly standards, and technical guides.
- Documents stored in correct format (PDF, CAD, spreadsheets, etc.) with full version updates.

Title: [Malbon] Operation Managers - Fashion Retails (Golf)
Company: Công Ty TNHH TKG CAPITAL Vietnam
Location: 144 Nguyễn Thái Bình, Nguyen Thai Binh, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, 144 Nguyễn Thái Bình, Phường Nguyễn Thái Bình, Quận 1, TP.HCM
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

Retail & Store Operations
- Manage day-to-day operations of Malbon stores, ensuring excellent customer experience and sales performance.
- Oversee store staff recruitment, training, scheduling, and performance management.
- Coordinate visual merchandising and inventory management to maintain brand standards.
- Implement in-store sales strategies and promotions.
- Manage the in-store digital platform (kiosks/tablets) and its integration with e-commerce.


Warehouse & Import Logistics
- Manage the warehouse operations, including receiving, storage, inventory control, and order fulfillment.
- Coordinate import logistics, customs clearance, and supplier relationships to ensure timely and cost-effective product availability.
- Implement inventory tracking systems and maintain stock accuracy across warehouse and store.
- Oversee the operations of the separate warehouse.
- Manage warehouse staff and processes.
- Ensure efficient storage and organization of goods.
- Implement warehouse safety and security procedures.

Multi-Channel Sales Support
- Collaborate with e-commerce, events, and B2B sales teams to ensure smooth order processing and delivery.
- Support sales initiatives at golf clubs’ pro shops and local events, facilitating product availability and logistics.
- Monitor sales data and operational KPIs to identify opportunities for process improvements.
- Manage the order fulfillment process for online sales.
- Handle e-commerce logistics and returns.
- Optimize the click-and-collect process.
- Develop and manage relationships with golf clubs to drive wholesale sales.
- Negotiate sales agreements and ensure timely delivery of orders.

Team Development & Growth
- Build and develop a local operations team as the brand grows and additional stores open.
- Foster a collaborative, high-performance culture aligned with Malbon’s brand values.
- Recruit, train, and manage a high-performing team.
- Set performance goals and provide ongoing feedback.

Cross-Functional Coordination
- Work closely with Marketing, Finance, Suppliers and International HQ to align operations with brand strategy and financial goals.
- Ensure compliance with local regulations and company policies.

Financial Management
- Manage operational budgets and expenses.
- Monitor sales performance and profitability.
- Prepare and present operational reports.

Reporting
- Provide regular reports to CEO and board of directors on key operational metrics.
Job Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, or a related field.
- Minimum 5+ years of experience in retail operations, preferably in fashion, lifestyle, or sports brands.
- Proven experience managing import logistics and warehouse operations.
- Strong understanding of e-commerce operations and fulfillment.
- Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.
- Fluency in English and Vietnamese (both written and spoken).
- Strong organizational and problem-solving skills.

Title: Kế Toán Tổng Hợp Kiêm Kế Toán Trưởng (Độ Tuổi Dưới 35)
Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN MAXCREATIVE
Location: tầng 3, tòa Việt, số 1 Phố Thái Hà, Trung Liệt, Đống Đa, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
- Điều hành toàn bộ hoạt động kế toán, bao gồm: kế toán nội bộ, tài chính, thuế, bảo hiểm, ngân sách và dòng tiền.
- Quản lý hệ thống sổ sách, hóa đơn, chứng từ đúng chuẩn mực kế toán và quy định pháp luật.
- Tổng hợp và phân tích các báo cáo tài chính – dòng tiền – chi phí để đưa ra tư vấn cho Ban giám đốc.
- Phối hợp với các bộ phận để lên kế hoạch ngân sách, kiểm soát chi phí và đánh giá hiệu quả sử dụng vốn.
- Làm việc với cơ quan thuế, kiểm toán, ngân hàng và các đối tác tài chính khác.
- Hướng dẫn, hỗ trợ team kế toán và các bộ phận liên quan về nghiệp vụ và quy trình tài chính.
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Tài chính - Kế toán - Kiểm toán
- Có từ 5 năm kinh nghiệm, trong đó ít nhất 2 năm ở vai trò Kế toán trưởng hoặc tương đương- Có chứng chỉ Kế toán trưởng
- Nắm vững chế độ kế toán, luật thuế, bảo hiểm và các quy định pháp lý liên quan
- Ưu tiên đã từng làm tại công ty dịch vụ, agency, hoặc công ty đa mảng ngành
- Cẩn thận, có tư duy hệ thống và chịu được áp lực cao
- Có tinh thần chủ động xây dựng hệ thống từ đầu, làm việc teamwork tốt


QUYỀN LỢI:
- Lương: Thỏa thuận theo năng lực của ứng viên.
- Phụ cấp theo tháng (xăng xe, ăn trưa,...) chưa bao gồm trong lương.
- Có bonus trên doanh thu.
- Thưởng vào các dịp Lễ, Tết.
- Tặng tiền mừng sinh nhật.
- Lương tháng 13, thưởng chuyên cần, thưởng trách nhiệm, thưởng chất lượng công việc cố định theo năm, thưởng kinh doanh theo tình hình kinh doanh của công ty.
- Xét duyệt tăng lương, thưởng khi đạt hiệu quả mong đợi của Ban giám đốc và theo mức độ gắn bó với công ty.
- Bảo hiểm Xã hội, Bảo hiểm Y tế, Bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo quy định của nhà nhà nước.
- Gói Bảo hiểm sức khỏe vàng PVI dành cho CBCNV.
- Khám sức khỏe tổng quát định kì hàng năm.
- Nghỉ phép có lương 12 ngày/năm, phép năm chưa sử dụng hết được chuyển đổi thành tiền mặt, thâm niên được tính theo năm, cộng 0.5 phép/năm thâm niên. Phép được cộng dồn không bị hủy theo năm.
- Du lịch 1 năm 1 lần, team-building và các chế độ khác ngoài lương không định kỳ.
- Thời gian làm việc: 9h -18h. Nghỉ trưa 12h30-13h30. Làm từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6 và 2 thứ 7/Tháng. Có chế độ về sớm cho nữ giới hàng tháng.
- Làm việc trong văn phòng hạng A (phòng nghỉ trưa, box phone, pantry, trà cafe chuẩn bị sẵn hàng ngày, teabreak, quà vặt, hoa tươi để bàn có quỹ hàng tháng).
- Trang thiết bị máy tính hiện đại phù hợp với chuyên môn.
- Làm việc với các Chủ đầu tư bất động sản lớn nhất Việt Nam: Vingroup, Sun Group,...
- Thẻ Taxi Xanh SM khi cần ra ngoài giao dịch công việc.
- Môi trường làm việc năng động, trang phục thoải mái không yêu cầu theo quy định.

Title: System Quality Engineer/ Quality Staff
Company: Seoul Semiconductor Vina
Location: Khu Công Nghiệp Đồng Văn 1, Bạch Thượng, Duy Tiên, Hà Nam, Dong Van 1 IZ., Duy Tien, Ha Nam
Job Description:
• Kiểm soát việc tuân thủ tài liệu thực tế dưới công đoạn (tài liệu đã update, đối sách cải tiến,..)
• Audit thực tế tại dây chuyền (5S, product, IATF và khách hàng audit..), đồng thời tổng hợp và duy trì các hoạt động cải tiến
• Hiểu biết về hệ thống IATF16949
• Có kinh nghiệm đào tạo
• Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cấu từ cấp trên
Job Requirements:
• Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên các chuyên ngành liên quan đến bán dẫn, điện, điện tử, vật liệu, vật lý, hóa học hoặc các nghành kỹ thuật liên quan
• Có kinh nghiệm Audit dây chuyền
• Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng được nhiều loại máy móc thiết bị
• Tiếng Anh giao tiếp khá hoặc ứng viên nói được Tiếng Hàn là một lợi thế
• Có khả năng chịu áp lực và làm thêm giờ
• Có kỹ năng tin học văn phòng

Title: Service & After-Sales Director
Company: Thai Hung corp
Location: Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam, Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Job Title: Service & After-Sales Director
Department: Service Division
Workplace: Office of Thai Binh Hung Thinh Joint Stock Company

I. Job Description:
Responsible for building, managing, and operating the entire repair, maintenance, warranty, and after-sales customer service system.
Ensure service quality, response time, and customer satisfaction according to the company's standards.

II. Key Responsibilities:
1. Develop and operate the after-sales service system
- Establish and refine the process of receiving, handling, and responding to customer complaints and technical requests.
- Set up technical service centers or collaborate with authorized warranty stations nationwide.

2. Organize repair and maintenance operations
- Set up systems for periodic maintenance, incident handling, and product warranty.
- Monitor progress, quality, and repair costs.
- Build strategic spare parts warehouses at key service locations.

3. Manage the technical and after-sales personnel
- Initial team expected to include 15–20 technicians and service specialists.
- Organize training, skill assessments, and performance evaluations for technical staff.

4. Customer relationship management
- Develop after-sales policies: extended warranty, periodic maintenance packages, technical support promotions.
- Manage CRM system, gather customer feedback, and prepare regular service reports.
- Organize customer appreciation events and training sessions on product usage and maintenance.

5. Collaborate with Production and Technical Departments
- Submit regular reports on field technical issues to support product improvement.
- Propose component and design enhancements to improve durability and reduce repair costs.

6. Manage service & after-sales budgets
- Establish cost benchmarks and service profitability calculations.
- Monitor revenue from maintenance packages, spare parts, and upgrade services.
Job Requirements:
III. Job Requirements:
Knowledge:
- Bachelor's degree in Automotive Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical–Electronics, or related fields.
Skill:
- Proven ability to design and implement a professional service system.
- Strong problem-solving and customer complaint resolution skills.
- Team leadership and technical training capabilities.
Experience:
- At least 5 years of experience in after-sales service management in the automotive or specialty vehicle sector.
- Experience building warranty systems or managing authorized service networks is a strong advantage.

IV. KPIs & Evaluation Criteria:
1. Service System Operations
- Target workforce (30 employees) achieved on time
- ≥ 95% shift coverage

2. Technical and Repair Quality
- Repeat failure rate ≤ 3% within 3 months after repair.
- ≥ 95% of products repaired to technical standards.

3. Service Personnel Management
- ≥ 90% of technicians certified internally after training.
- ≥ 95% adherence to standard service processes.

4. Cost & Revenue Management
- Revenue from spare parts and maintenance packages grows ≥ 15% per quarter.
- Service cost per vehicle ≤ planned benchmark.

5. Reporting & Process Improvement
- ≥ 1 monthly report on product faults submitted to production.
- ≥ 1 service or product improvement proposal submitted per month.
Level: Giám Đốc và Cấp Cao Hơn

Title: Manufacturing Shop Manager
Company: Thai Hung corp
Location: Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam, Số 266, Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Xã Phụ Dực, Tỉnh Hưng Yên, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Job Title: Manufacturing Shop Manager
Department: Manufacturing Department

I. Job Description:
Oversee all operations of the mechanical manufacturing workshop, from technical analysis and production planning to resource management and process supervision. Ensure safety, efficiency, technical accuracy, and on-time delivery in alignment with Thai Binh Hung Thinh JSC’s modern industrial manufacturing goals.

II. Key Responsibilities:
1. Manufacturing management
- Plan, assign, and coordinate production based on orders and workshop capacity.
- Monitor progress and resolve issues affecting production schedules.

2. Technical Implementation & Drawing Interpretation
- Collaborate with technical teams to interpret drawings and define materials and production methods.
- Guide workers to understand technical requirements and verify drawing feasibility.

3. Quality & Process Control
- Implement and supervise technological processes; ensure product quality control.
- Identify and propose improvements for production inefficiencies.

4. Machinery, Equipment & Tooling Management
- Ensure equipment operates safely, reliably, and is properly maintained.
- Organize and manage tools efficiently and systematically.

5. Machinery, Equipment & Tooling Management
- Structure workforce by shifts; assign and monitor daily tasks.
- Train workers, enforce discipline, and support performance evaluations.

6. Material & Supply Management
- Plan and control materials according to progress and consumption norms.
- Ensure material readiness to avoid production disruptions.

7. Production Improvement & Optimization
- Propose technical, process, and layout improvements to boost productivity and reduce waste.
- Promote and maintain 5S and Kaizen practices for a clean, professional, and efficient workplace.

8. Internal Reporting & Coordination
- Report regularly on progress, quality, workforce, equipment, and materials to the Production Director.
- Coordinate with departments to ensure continuous and efficient production flow.
- Perform other duties as assigned by the Board of Directors.
Job Requirements:
II. Job Requirements:
Knowledge:
- Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Automotive Engineering, Industrial Engineering, or related fields.
Skill:
- Capable of building organizational systems, establishing workflows, and guiding production operations.
- Strong leadership skills with experience managing multi-shift teams and cross-departmental coordination.
- Proficient in analyzing production data, evaluating performance, and driving process improvements.
Experience:
- At least 5 years of experience in managing a mechanical manufacturing workshop or equivalent role.
- Preference given to candidates with knowledge of Lean, 5S, Kaizen, or experience in Japanese/Korean manufacturing environments.

IV. KPIs & Evaluation Criteria:
1. Manfacturing management
- ≥ 95% of production orders completed on time as scheduled.
- No production delays caused by internal organizatio
2. Technical Implementation & Drawing Interpretation
- 100% of technical documentation completed fully and on time before production launch.
- No more than 1 technical error due to drawing misinterpretation per quarter.
3. Quality & Process Control
- ≥ 90% of products meet quality standards on the first pass.
- No more than 1 process system error per month.
4. Machinery, Equipment & Tooling Management
- ≥ 98% of machinery operates stably without downtime due to lack of maintenance.
- 100% of machines and equipment maintained according to the planned schedule.
5. Machinery, Equipment & Tooling Management
- ≥ 95% of production shifts staffed adequately with proper task assignments.
- 100% of teams/groups receive monthly performance evaluations.
6. Material & Supply Management
- Material loss ≤ 3% of the allowable consumption rate.
- 100% of raw materials prepared on schedule with no production interruptions
7. Production Improvement & Optimization
- At least 1 effective improvement proposal submitted per month.
- ≥ 60% of proposed improvements implemented and proven effective.
8. Internal Reporting & Coordination
- 100% of daily/weekly/monthly reports submitted fully and on time.
- No production delays due to poor interdepartmental coordination.
